content:
ActorCallType ActorCallType Enum

Definition

Namespace:
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Actors.dll

Represents the call-type associated with the method invoked by actor runtime.

Edit

In this Article

public enum ActorCallTypePublic Enum ActorCallType

Remarks

This is provided as part of ActorMethodContext which is passed as argument to OnPreActorMethodAsync(ActorMethodContext) and OnPostActorMethodAsync(ActorMethodContext).

Fields

ActorInterfaceMethod ActorInterfaceMethod

The method invoked is an actor interface method for a given client request.
ReminderMethod ReminderMethod

The method invoked on IRemindable interface when a reminder fires.
TimerMethod TimerMethod

The method invoked is a timer callback method.
